name: Left for Bread
description:
Play this game in fullscreen for best experience

Bartholomew the Fourth has been abandoned by his mommy at the checkout counter. Will he wait the 23 seconds for his mom to come back (nudge,nudge, wink wink) or journey through the unknown aisles of the grocery store to find her? Can you find the secret ending?

McGameJam 2022 Team 8 - Left 4 Bread 2

Controls

Arrow keys to move
Up arrow to jump
Spacebar to shoot

Credits:

  • Katie Schunk - Art 
  • Alex Baptista - Programming 
  • James McManus - Programming 
  • Shadman Asraf - Quest Design 
  • Music by Hairband Truman (https://soundcloud.com/hairband-truman-623680010)
